contentrichtext.text: {{Taxobox | name = Calodactylodes | regnum = [[Animal]]ia | phylum = [[Chordate|Chordata]] | classis = [[Reptile|Reptilia]] | ordo = [[Squamata]] | familia = [[Gekkonidae]] | subfamilia = [[Gekkoninae]] | genus = '''''Calodactylodes''''' | genus_authority = [[Richard Henry Beddome|Beddome]]<ref>Beddome,R.H. 1870. Descriptions of some new lizards from the Madras Presidency. Madras Monthly J. Med. Sci. 1: 30-35</ref> | subdivision_ranks =Species | subdivision = * ''[[Calodactylodes aureus]]'' * ''[[Calodactylodes illingworthi]]''}} '''''Calodactylodes''''' is a [[genus]] of [[Gekkonidae]] (gecko) family. It contains two species. *Indian Golden Gecko, ''[[Calodactylodes aureus]]'' *Sri Lankan Golden Gecko, ''[[Calodactylodes illingworthi]]'' ==References== {{Reflist}} *{{NRDB genus|genus=Calodactylodes}} [[Category:Geckos]] {{gecko-stub}}
